title: HS30092: Demography - Quick Facts
text:
HS30092
Course name | Demography
Offered by | Humanities & Social Sciences
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: None Course ContentsIntroduction, Classical theories of demography (modern population theories of fertility- socio-economic approach), Fertility and its current pattern in India, reproductive motivation in developing societies, Decision making of households, Family planning in developing world, Health and mortality, Aging, Migration, Empirical analysis of demography (e.g., Female education and fertility, female employment rate and fertility, etc.), Demographic policies, Social and demographic change, Social and Demographic inequality in developing countries, World population and India, and Contemporary issues of Demography.
